doc.title: Consecuencia, la vida
doc.plot: A Miami youth gang struggles to keep a high-tech car theft operation alive. Jimmy (Dani Driggs) is a 20 year old gang member with an uncertain future. With his older brother serving life in prison and his divorced parents thousand of miles away, the gang becomes his family. When the gang gets a call for a special car to be stolen, Jimmy is selected for the job and has only until midnight to steal it. As a result, Jimmy gets caught in the action and what seemed to be an easy ride becomes the lesson of a life time.
